Name: ESETPROTECT
Author: Nikhil Tripathi - v-ntripathi@microsoft.com
Description: This connector gathers all events generated by ESET software through the central management solution ESET PROTECT (formerly ESET Security Management Center). This includes Anti-Virus detections, Firewall detections but also more advanced EDR detections. For a complete list of events please refer to [the documentation](https://help.eset.com/protect_admin/latest/en-US/events-exported-to-json-format.html).
